attributes.action: deduct from the income of every MP, proportionate to his/her expenses over the last ten years, the entire £6m cost of setting up and running the proposed organisation to police their expenses claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most MPs have claimed around £20,000 each year, i.e. £200,000 over the last ten.  This proposal claws back about £10,000, i.e. 5%.  They, not we, should pay for this measure that their lack of integrity has made necessary.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
